data.question: What is the highest SO2 adsorption capacity reported for MFM-601?
Which material shows a higher BET surface area, MFM-600 or MFM-601?
Is the SO2 adsorption in MFM-601 reversible?
What method was used to calculate the isosteric heat of adsorption for SO2 in MFM-601?
Does the transformation of MFM-600 to MFM-601 increase the selectivity of SO2 over CO2?
What is the role of benzoic acid in the synthesis of MFM-600?
Can MFM-601 adsorb CO2 and N2 along with SO2?
What is the main structural difference between MFM-600 and MFM-601?
data.answer: MFM-601 is obtained by postsynthetic removal of a linker from MFM-600.

data.question: Is the adsorption capacity of SO2 in MFM-601 higher at 273 K or 298 K?
Does the synthesis of MFM-601 involve heating with HCl?
What is the BET surface area of MFM-601?
Is the SO2 adsorption capacity of MFM-601 the highest observed under the same conditions?
What is the precursor molecule used in the synthesis of MFM-600 and MFM-601?
Does MFM-601 have a higher SO2 adsorption capacity than MFM-600?
What is the effect of acid treatment on the structure of MFM-600 to form MFM-601?
data.answer: It leads to a structural phase transition and removal of monodentate linkers.

data.question: Is the SO2 adsorption capacity of MFM-601 affected over five cycles of adsorption/desorption?
What is the main advantage of using MFM-601 for SO2 adsorption over other materials?
data.answer: It offers high adsorption capacity, reversibility, and selectivity over CO2 and N2.
